body.name: Philips Hue Go White and Color Portable Dimmable LED Smart Light Table Lamp (Requires Hue Hub, Works with Alexa, HomeKit and Google Assistant), White
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 20 hrs 10 mins
Or fastest Same-Day pickup Today 2 PM - 6 PM. Order within 3 hrs 10 mins
features: VOICE CONTROL: The Philips Hue Go White and Color Portable Smart Light Table Lamp works with Alexa smart home devices for voice control (hue hub required, Alexa smart device and hub sold separately). For the full Hue experience and to take advantage of voice activation purchase the Philips Hue Hub (Model: 458471). Search "Philips Hue Hub" or "B016H0QZ7I" to find this product on Amazon.

LIMITLESS POSSIBILITIES: The wireless, portable and rechargeable Hue Go lasts up to 3 hours without needing a charge. Control through the Hue home automation system or via the on-product button. Customize your own personal light show on the go, capable of 16 million colors and shades of white light.

EASY AND CONVENIENT: Control your Philips Hue Go even without your smart device at hand. Activate smart light settings directly by pressing the button on the product. Or connect with the Hue Hub (sold separately) to control with the Philips Hue App.
EXPAND YOUR ECOSYSTEM: Expand your smart lighting system with Hue accessories (sold separately) such as a Hue Dimmer switch, Hue Tap, or Hue Motion Sensor.

SMART HOME DEVICE COMPATIBILIITY: Control your Philips Hue lights with your voice using smart home devices like Alexa, Apple HomeKit, or Google Assistant. Pair it for home automation with your existing Nest or Samsung SmartThings system.80 CRI from 2000-4000K
body.description: The Philips Hue Go White and Color Portable Smart Light Table Lamp provides limitless possibilities for extraordinary smart home experiences. Add a Philips Hue Go with white and colored hue light to your smart lighting system. The Hue Go has an elegant design with a transparent casing. It is wireless, portable and rechargeable, up to 3 hours. Control through the Hue system or via the on-product button.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Helps me wake up in the morning (yes, it does make a big difference!)
reviews.reviewText: In my mind, this product is ideal to put on a table by the side of your bed. Changing colors sets a nice mood. Turning lights off and on from your phone is handy. The biggest thing by far is setting it with your alarm so that it helps you wake up. It makes a big difference shining in your eyes and helps me get on track.The build is nice and solid enough. My child dropped mine and the top popped off. I put it back on and we've been good to go. No big deal. Battery life isn't going to be incredible because it's a light—it burns serious power. But it works for a romantic outside date—maybe 1.5 to 2 hours depending on brightness. The button on the back is legitimately helpful. If I'm outside I might not be connected to wifi and don't want to only control from the app. So turning on and changing colors with a physical button is really handy.It's quite bright. Totally sufficient for setting the mood in a bedroom or use as a reading light. Think something like a small beside lamp and you'll be on the right track.Learn to have fun with it. Away on a trip I put on sappy red for my wife back home to let her know I was thinking of her. My kids like to pretend that they're on the moon finding martians (yeah, doesn't make sense) so changing the light to green on my phone tells them the martians are coming. Still, my favorite uses are setting a mood and waking up in the morning.One small gripe. The charger cord has a funny bend so the light can stand up. That's all fine I suppose, but after only a year and mostly just beside my bed, it's fraying. I'm not sure how I would replace it without ordering from Philipps directly. So I'd like to see better construction there.Overall, totally glad I got this product and recommend it without reserve.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Lighting for Many Situations: TV, Games, Reading.
reviews.reviewText: The Go's dual power source is nice. It will run on its built-in rechargeable battery or can be plugged into an AC outlet.We use it in the evening while watching TV or playing video games. In a darkened room, reducing it to a low setting is perfect for adding just enough light to see the game controllers and TV remote. No longer a need to get up and turn on a light to find the right button on the control.The candle setting is the family favorite for most situations. The gentle flickering of soft yellow light is a great imitation of candle-light and a relaxing, much-used effect.We have added the Hue Smart Bridge ( Philips Hue Smart Bridge (Compatible with Amazon Alexa, Apple HomeKit, and Google Assistant) ) and the Hue Dimmer ( Philips Hue Smart Dimmer Switch with Remote (Installation-Free, Exclusive for Philips Hue Lights) ) which in combo permit control by both the Hue Dimmer control or by using voice commands through Amazon's Echo. Although neither of these is necessary to operate the Go, the three working together are amazing.For this purchase, it was an easy decision to click on all five-stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High quality product
reviews.reviewText: You must keep in mind this lamp is designed for indirect light. This lamp is not designed to light up a room like a regular lamp. This being said, it fulfills its purpose and its a great asset to create a nice ambiance. I use this one in my bedroom since its a smaller area, and I use the A19 philips hue and strip for my living room which is larger. Portability is a nice feature that I rarely use. I have disconnected it and taken it to the bathroom, good for relaxing in the hot tub with low light of whatever color you choose (please do not immerse the lamp in the water, thanks). As with any other philips hue product, you can use other apps to create smooth transitioning sequences or to synchronize to music you are playing. You do have a lot of fun possibilities. I don’t really use Siri that much, but I gotta say sometimes I fall asleep with my lights on and its really cool just to say “Siri, turn off the lights” without leaving my bed or without even reaching my phone. This is a high quality product, I own many philips hue product and I highly recommend them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 27, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Versatile and portable
reviews.reviewText: This lamp looks nice, and works as advertised. If you want/need some accent lighting, I would recommend this, as it is quite versatile by not requiring to be plugged in at all times, though the battery only lasts about 3.5 hours. Also, the cord is replaceable (theoretically...they don't sell them, so good luck...but at least you can use a cord from a second device to charge in the meantime).It's definitely different than the other lights, though, in that it can only be controlled through the hue bridge when it is on (or in standby mode, which only lasts 2 hours). Also, being portable makes you think about it a little more when you do configure it on the bridge (I made a separate room for it, since it bounces around rooms).The downsides are that it isn't especially stable when sitting at an angle...it was very easy for my cats to knock it over, and the face scratches very easily. While the light still works, and the scratches don't affect the light, it makes you sad to see the scratches when the light is off.
Good table lamp especially since it is portable. Can be placed anywhere in the room and gives great aesthetic ambience

I bought these, along with some other Hue lights, to make my room look a little more creative and I absolutely love these lights. The GO lights are fantastic and once they go on sale again, I'm probably buying 4 or 5 more. The Hue app makes them so easy to use and customize.You can even use the app to set up scenarios and schedules. For example, I have to wake up 7:15 AM. At 7:00 AM I have the lights set to go from 0% at 7:00 AM to 100% at 7:10 AM and the change is gradual. It's a great way to help me naturally wake up in preparation to my alarm at 7:15 AM. Sometimes I wake up just from the lights and aren't jarred awake by an alarm.The color customization is fantastic and extremely accurate. The fact that these have internal batteries and can be used as lights on the go make them even better.I highly recommend!

reviews.reviewTitle: Increíble lampara que reune lo mejor de la linea Hue de Phillips
reviews.reviewText: Creo que este es uno de los artículos que mas pasan desapercibidos de la linea de productos Hue de Phillips pero es el que mas gratamente me ha sorprendido, la lampara es de un muy buen tamaño y de un acabado plástico brillante en la parte exterior que rodea el circulo principal de la lampara y un acabado plástico mate en el circulo principal, luce un poco frágil y susceptible arañazos en la parte brillante pero le da un acabado bastante bonito y de muy buena calidad.Describo lo que mas me gustó de este articuloPRIMERO que es una lampara que esta enfocada como el nombre lo dice para ser portátil, ya que es de los pocos artículos de Phillips Hue que puede ser usado sin el Bridge o Hub de Phillips ya que cuenta con un botón en la parte de atrás de la lampara el cual permite apagar, encender o cambiar de color entre una serie de escenas predeterminadas, por lo que no necesitas el teléfono o algún otro accesorio para cambiar de color la lampara e incluso incluye una escena de luz que simula una vela y luce increíble visto de lejos sobre una mesa o una repisa en verdad piensas que es una vela, este estilo no se encuentra de manera predeterminada en ningún otro producto de la familia Philips Hue,SEGUNDO, la duración de la batería tal vez no es tanta como se podría esperar pero bastante decente, depende mucho la intensidad del brillo pero sin problemas te puede durar unas 3 horas, cabe mencionar que en el modo portátil la intensidad de la luz de la lampara se encuentra limitada y solo podrás obtener el 100% de intensidad al momento de conectarla a la corriente.TERCERO, La orientación de la conexión a la corriente, la lampara cuenta con un orificio en la parte de atrás para conectar a la corriente la lampara el cual es bastante discreto y profundo por lo que no rompe con el diseño y me parece un excelente acierto, pero aun mas que el cable tenga una forma especial en diagonal que hace que al conectarla a la corriente se pueda poner recargada la lampara hacia un costado apoyado en la protuberancia que tiene en la parte de abajo haciendo que el cable pueda pasar casi desapercibido, bien ubicado ese cable en una repisa queda completamente oculto haciendo lucir mas el diseño de la lampara.CUARTO. Versatilidad, La versatilidad que tiene esta lampara es lo que mas me gusta de ella, puedes ponerla boca arriba, boca abajo, apoyada en el costado, proyectando hacia una pared, hacia el techo y en cualquier forma lucirá bien, pero lo mejor de todo es que es la lampara ideal para sacar provecho de la nueva aplicación propia de Philips llamada Hue Sync, esta aplicación es para un usuario con conocimiento técnico semi avanzado que con ayuda del Hue Bridge (Hub de conexión común de Philips del sistema de luces HUE) y con la aplicación Hue Sync instalada en una computadora Windows o Mac , permite configurar tus luces para que se sincronicen con la música que se este escuchando en la computadora o con una película o videojuego que se este viendo en la computadora e imita la reproducción de color que se este visualizando en pantalla con las luces lo cual crea un efecto de inmersión muy bueno al ver una película, ya que la calidad y velocidad de la sincronización es muy buena.Definitivamente recomiendo esta lampara Philips Hue Go, pero aunque se puede usar sin necesidad del Bridge de Phillips Hue definitivamente lo necesitaras para sacar completamente provecho de ella.

reviews.reviewTitle: Es una excelente inversión, alumbra bien y es portable.
reviews.reviewText: Tal cual la descripción, es una buena lámpara, los colores son vibrantes, si tienes el Hue Bridge es una maravilla. Totalmente recomendado.

reviews.reviewTitle: Nice Add on for a smart home setup.
reviews.reviewText: I am already using Philips Hue Light Strip Plus. I m so impressed by it that I felt this need to be added on with more lights. which I can control via Philips Hue Bridge the same as Light Strip. If you looking for Nitelamp kind of light this is nice to have.
